div.p: OBENSHAIN, KATE. TRY SAYING THAT FIVE TIMES.
AT THAT SHOW I NAILED DOWN THE INTERVIEW WITH PRESIDENT OBAMA
WHO ATTENDED. ALSO I HAD A VERY NICE
CONVERSATION WITH CONGRESSWOMAN NANCY PELOSI AND HER HUSBAND AT
THE WHITE HOUSE. IN THAT CONVERSATION, MRS.
PELOSI GRACIOUSLY INVITED ME TO COME TO HER OFFICE ON CAPITOL
HILL TO DO AN INTERVIEW. SHE SAID THIS IN FRONT OF
MULTIPLE WITNESSES, SO OF COURSE WE FOLLOWED UP AND WE EXPECTED
TO BOOK A NICE CHAT. BUT NOW NANCY PELOSI IS
RENEGING, SHE IS NOT GOING TO DO THE INTERVIEW.
SO HERE IS THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
WHEN YOU LOOK SOMEONE IN THE EYE AND SAY YOU’RE GOING TO DO
SOMETHING, DO IT. IF YOU DON’T DO IT, YOU LOSE
FACE. RESPECT, BECAUSE YOUR WORD IS NO
GOOD. WE HOPE NANCY PELOSI WILL CHANGE
HER MIND. WE HOPE SHE INCORPORATES THE TIP
OF THE DAY. AND THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT.
PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR WEBSITE WHICH IS
